channel.title: “Ubuntu” on Worldwide Stew
channel.description: Recent content in “Ubuntu” on Worldwide Stew

item.title: Deep Dive: Ethics, psychiatry and industry funding; cool biodegradable coffins; Ubuntu; Chaplains replacing school counselors
item.description: “Is it okay for industry to fund the DSM-5-TR panel?; Is it okay for chaplains to replace school counselors?; Is it time to order your biodegradable coffin?; and, others!”
